p: On the other hand, all the measured reproductive traits (the number of flowers, fruits, seed, and fruit dry mass) were higher in the population of the abandoned fields habitat, while the lowest values of these parameters were recorded in the mountain ranges habitat. The number of fruits, flowers, seed, and fruit dry mass in the abandoned fields habitat were 8.4-, 3.6-, 2.9-, and 2.7-fold higher than those determined for the population in mountain ranges habitat ( Table 1).
